Module HunterPaceTimes
Package Application

Class Settings

java.lang.Object
Application.Settings
public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
A collected list of all application settings for the program. This class is saved into a Json file upon start up, and whenever Main.saveSettings() is called. save() should not be called from anywhere except for Main.saveSettings() so that the application doesn't save the file too much in a given timeframe.
See Also:
Json

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static void load()
      Initial Loading of the settings file. This will read the file using the Json tool, converting it to an object, and assigning the setting values. After initial loading, it will save the file in order to apply any changes / new settings that the current file does not have

    • save

      public static void save()
      Saves the settings into a file using the Json tool
